name: Droidmals: Lavanlier Town
description:
Introduction
Droidmals is a collectible creature JRPG with a horror setting and theme. The game is all done in pixel art

History
You wake up after passing out and discover that you are the only (or almost) human being present in the city where you were born and raised, all around you a devastated landscape and no escape route. You have been sealed in Lavander Town along with terrible creatures. You have only two options, die or capture them all!

Gameplay
Classic JRPG turn-based combat. Possibilities of capturing hostile Droidmals you encounter so they can fight alongside you. Droidmals in Lavander Town are unique creatures, there is only one of each species! Some of them can evolve into something stronger, all as they level up they learn new moves.
